text:
Hi,

Yes you try this with the custom script coding. HubSpot provides the list of cookies that it saved on user browser. Here is the complete list.
<https://knowledge.HubSpot.com/privacy-and-consent/what-cookies-does-HubSpot-set-in-a-visitor-s-browser>

HubSpot sets the cookie in browser when user accept the cookie banner. You can use that cookie to show or hide the form.
